_sText:
that's an extended version of [de_lotus](http://gamebanana.com/css/maps/163728 "de_lotus")

i've mainly published this map here to check opinions if the map is suitable for playing at all.
i've done heavy optimization of the map with func_detail, hints and area portals but ppl complaining about lags & slow fps. i agree, many ppl playing cs:s still have nvidia 8000 series.

guys, could you check the map and report your video, cpu and lowest FPS? (i guess the lowest one is looking at the full length river's surface.

thank you
